location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'Rough Sketch Map of the UNDEMARCATED PORTION of the PERSO-AFGHAN FRONTIER'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: printed on paperDimensions: 330 x 200 mmFoliation: the map has been foliated with a number written in pencil enclosed in a circle in the top right corner of the recto side of the folio.

mods.abstract: Map compiled by Lieutenant Terence Humphrey Keyes, His Britannic Majesty's Vice-Consul for Seistan [Sīstān] and Kain [Kūh-e Kā’īn].Imprint: 'Lith., S. I. O., Calcutta'.Distinctive features: shows line of actual possession by Afghans as admitted by Persians; frontier on 1897 map; and customs posts.
